content: **skill** easy knit in the round **size** 0-3 3-6 6-12 months **actual baby head circumference** 13 ~14 14 ~17 16 ~19 **hat circumference** approx 11 5 14 5 17 **hat height** approx 5 5 5 6 5 **gauge** 22 sts x 30 row = 4 x 4 in stocking sts **needles** four us#6 4 mm double pointed needles yarn needle **yarn needed** category 4 medium worsted weight yarn approx 50 to 100 yds white color a approx 42 yds to 86 yds yellow color b 8 yds to 14 yds **yarn i used** lion brand martha stewart crafts extra soft wool blend color a bakery box white 500 color b lemon chiffon 557 **abbreviations** k=knit p=purl k2tog=knit-two-together **© christy hills 2013 all rights reserved this pattern is not for commercial personal use only please do not resell distribute or reprint this pattern unless expressly for your own use and convenience but you can use for charity **
